hw2

Class GridUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • hw2.GridUtil

  • public class GridUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for an implementation of Minesweeper. This class contains methods for examining and updating a 2D array of Cell objects.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static char MINE_CHAR
      Marker character for initializing a 2D array of cells from an array of Strings.

    • Method Detail

      • createFromStringArray

        public static Cell[][] createFromStringArray(java.lang.String[] descriptor)
        Creates a 2D array of Cells from an array of strings, where each string corresponds to one row of the returned array. The jth character of the ith string corresponds to row i, column j of the Cell array. A MINE_CHAR character means the corresponding cell will be set as a mine. All strings in the given array must have the same length. This method does not calculate the counts for the cells. Initially all cells have status HIDDEN, count 0, and mark value NONE.
        Parameters:
        descriptor - array of strings from which to construct the Cell array
        Returns:
        2D array of Cells

      • convertToStringArray

        public static java.lang.String[] convertToStringArray(Cell[][] grid,
                                                      boolean revealAll)
        Converts a grid into an array of strings. Each row of the grid corresponds to one string. There is one character for each cell. If revealAll is false, then all HIDDEN cells are are displayed as '-', 'f', or '?' depending on whether the mark value is NONE, FLAG, or QUESTION_MARK. Revealed mines are displayed with MINE_CHAR, and other revealed cells are displayed as the count.

        if revealAll is true, then all mines are displayed as MINE_CHAR and all other non-mines are displayed as the count.

        Parameters:
        grid - 2D array of Cells
        revealAll - true if hidden values should be shown, false otherwise
        Returns:
        array of strings representing the grid

      • initCounts

        public static void initCounts(Cell[][] grid)
        Initialize the count value for each cell in the given 2D array. The count for a non-mine is the number of neighboring cells (left, right, top, bottom, and diagonal) that are mines. The count for a mine is -1.
        Parameters:
        grid - 2D array of Cells

      • countNeighboringMines

        public static int countNeighboringMines(Cell[][] grid,
                                        int givenRow,
                                        int givenCol)
        Counts the number of neighbors of the given position (left, right, top, bottom, and diagonal) that are mines.
        Parameters:
        grid - 2D array of Cells
        givenRow - given position row
        givenCol - given position column
        Returns:
        number of neighbors that are mines

      • areAllCellsRevealed

        public static boolean areAllCellsRevealed(Cell[][] grid)
        Determines whether all the non-mine cells have status REVEALED.
        Parameters:
        grid - 2D array of Cells
        Returns:
        true if all non-mine cells are revealed, false otherwise

      • revealAllMines

        public static void revealAllMines(Cell[][] grid)
        Sets all mine cells to have status REVEALED. Other cells are not modified.
        Parameters:
        grid - 2D array of Cells

      • countAllMines

        public static int countAllMines(Cell[][] grid)
        Returns the total number of mines in the given array.
        Parameters:
        grid - 2D array of Cells
        Returns:
        number of mines in the array

      • countAllFlags

        public static int countAllFlags(Cell[][] grid)
        Returns the total number of cells marked as FLAG in the given array.
        Parameters:
        grid - 2D array of Cells
        Returns:
        number of flagged cells

      • findOneHiddenNeighbor

        public static Cell findOneHiddenNeighbor(Cell[][] grid,
                                         int givenRow,
                                         int givenCol)
        Returns one neighbor (left, right, top, bottom, diagonal) of the given position that is hidden and has count greater than zero or null if there is no such cell.
        Parameters:
        grid - 2D array of Cells
        givenRow - given position row
        givenCol - given position column
        Returns:
        a hidden, non-mine cell that neighbors the given position

      • flagAllMines

        public static void flagAllMines(Cell[][] grid)
        Sets all mine cells to have mark value Mark.FLAG.
        Parameters:
        grid - 2D array of Cells

      • revealNeighbors

        public static void revealNeighbors(Cell[][] grid,
                                   int givenRow,
                                   int givenCol,
                                   java.util.ArrayList<Cell> history)
        Reveals all neighbors of the Cell at the given position that are not mines and have count greater than zero. If the given ArrayList is non-null, all revealed cells are added to the list, in the order in which they are revealed.
        Parameters:
        grid - 2D array of Cells
        givenRow - given position row
        givenCol - given position column
        history - list to which revealed cells are added

      • clearRegion

        public static void clearRegion(Cell[][] grid,
                               int row,
                               int col,
                               java.util.ArrayList<Cell> history)
        Performs a "flood fill" algorithm to reveal a region of all reachable cells with count zero, plus the cells at the boundary of the region, starting at the given position. If the cell at the given position does not have count 0, this method does nothing. If the given ArrayList is non-null, all revealed cells are added to the list, in the order in which they are revealed.
        Parameters:
        grid - 2D
        row - initial cell row
        col - initial cell column
        history - list to which revealed cells are added
